sources.title: "Whistles And Windows" (1918) starring Larry Semon
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems    This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   This film is part of our brand new Larry Semon collection of short comedies. Please see below important details about this collection. "Whistles And Windows" is a short comedy directed by Larry Semon starring Larry Semon, Madge Kirby, Frank Alexander and others. A Special Announcement As part of our Silent Gems Collection of rare high quality films we have released a set of discs named: Endless Slapstick. Larry Semon: The Ultimate Collection Highlights of this exclusive and unique collection: 1/ this is the most comprehensive Larry Semon collection ever released - it includes no less than 61 short comedies on 13 DVDs. 2/ almost half of these films have never been available on home video. 3/ most of these films are brand new high resolution transfers made with cutting-edge true frame-by-frame scanning technology, offering superior quality compared to other releases. 4/ many of these films are transfers combined from more than one source print and include numerous scenes that have never been available for viewing in other releases; thus, the films in our collection represent the most complete versions possible. 5/ Larry Semon is just one of a whole constellation of stars, in particular, Oliver Hardy stars in 21 films, Stan Laurel in 3 other films, and Monty Banks in still one other film. 6/ Larry Semon fans will be delighted with this new exclusive collection, which offers 23 hours of mirth from sidesplitting slapstick!
